synopsis.text: Whatâ€™s in store for Arata Miyako as he embarks on his new career at the Shinjuku Ward Office's Nighttime Regional Relations Department? Little does he know, he's not just dealing with the mundane tasks of a civil servant; instead, he's thrust into a world of paranormal events and occult creatures unseen by ordinary humans. Arata's unique ability to understand non-human speech sets him apart from his colleagues, and his life takes an unexpected turn when he encounters a Youkai who mistakes him for the legendary Heian-era exorcist, Abe no Seimei. As Arata navigates through this mysterious world, he uncovers a connection between himself and the famous exorcist, piquing his curiosity and leading him to delve deeper into the enigmatic realm of the supernatural. But with great power comes great responsibility, and Arata soon realizes that his unique gift may not be as simple as he initially thought, as danger begins to lurk around every corner. Will Arata rise to the challenge and uncover the truth about his origins, or will the world of the occult prove to be too much for him to handle? Only time will tell in this thrilling and engaging anime adaptation of "Midnight Occult Civil Servants".
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
